qas.question: How many residents live in the master-planned communities?

answers.text: in the western foothills of the Santa Catalina Mountains

qas.question: Where is the Continental Ranch planned community?
Where is the Dove Mountain planned community?
Where is the Rancho Vistoso planned community?

context: The expansive area <a8_0>northwest<a8_0/> of the city limits is diverse, ranging from the rural communities of Catalina and parts of the town of Marana, the small suburb of Picture Rocks, the affluent town of Oro Valley <a4_0>in the western foothills of the <a1_0>Santa Catalina Mountains<a4_0/><a1_0/>, and residential areas in the northeastern foothills of the Tucson Mountains. Continental Ranch (<a5_0>Marana<a5_0/>), Dove Mountain (<a3_0><a6_0>Marana<a6_0/><a3_0/>), and Rancho Vistoso (<a2_0><a7_0>Oro Valley<a7_0/><a2_0/>) are all masterplanned communities located in the Northwest, where <a0_0>thousands<a0_0/> of residents live.
